text: This boy over here standing on the chair that's falling over. The girl down below. The boy's up there. He has a cookie jar up there. He's putting cookies and then things falling over. And there's the lady. He's washing dishes and drying them. The sink turned on and the water's running down and is running on the floor and she's standing in the water. She's got a dress on and she's looking out how to pass drapes down here. and she's looking out to the window. Looks like that boy's going to fall over pretty soon.
